title: Oriental loses bid to recover Sh122m penalty
content: Standard Business   Business / Standard Business  58 minutes ago  4 Views  comments    CBK will not refund a Sh122 million fine it slapped on Oriental Commercial Bank in 1993 for its involvement in the infamous Goldenberg scandal.
